verses.name: Exodus 8:25
verses.text: And Pharaoh called for Moses and for Aaron, and said, Go ye, sacrifice to your God in the land.

verses.name: Exodus 8:26
verses.text: And Moses said, It is not meet so to do; for we shall sacrifice the abomination of the Egyptians to the Lord our God: lo, shall we sacrifice the abomination of the Egyptians before their eyes, and will they not stone us?

verses.name: Exodus 8:27
verses.text: We will go three days’ journey into the wilderness, and sacrifice to the Lord our God, as he shall command us.
